Class CoursesBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.extension.CoursesBean

  • public class CoursesBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Auxiliary class that retrieves a list of selected courses
    Author:
    patricio

      • getAllCourses

        public static CoursesBean getAllCourses(java.lang.String userID)
        Get a list of courses
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of a user. If user is an administrator or instructor, all courses are retrieved. If user is an student, only those courses where the student is not registered are retrieved
        Returns:
        A object
